title: 原版模组制作时遇到的的两个问题
author: 璀璨LJT
txt_content:
问题1：想要制作透明材质，却变成了透视材质。之前在论坛上好像看到解决方案的帖子，但是搜不到。


问题2：这是我为了让自定义方块能被活塞/史莱姆方块推拉而写的一则函数
execute if block ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:moving_piston{facing:0,extending:0b,progress:0f} run tp @s ~ ~1 ~
execute if block ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:moving_piston{facing:1,extending:0b,progress:0f} run tp @s ~ ~-1 ~
execute if block ~ ~ ~1 minecraft:moving_piston{facing:2,extending:0b,progress:0f} run tp @s ~ ~ ~1
execute if block ~ ~ ~-1 minecraft:moving_piston{facing:3,extending:0b,progress:0f} run tp @s ~ ~ ~-1
execute if block ~1 ~ ~ minecraft:moving_piston{facing:4,extending:0b,progress:0f} run tp @s ~1 ~ ~
execute if block ~-1 ~ ~ minecraft:moving_piston{facing:5,extending:0b,progress:0f} run tp @s ~-1 ~ ~
execute if block ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:moving_piston{facing:0,extending:1b,progress:0f} run tp @s ~ ~-1 ~
execute if block ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:moving_piston{facing:1,extending:1b,progress:0f} run tp @s ~ ~1 ~
execute if block ~ ~ ~-1 minecraft:moving_piston{facing:2,extending:1b,progress:0f} run tp @s ~ ~ ~-1
execute if block ~ ~ ~1 minecraft:moving_piston{facing:3,extending:1b,progress:0f} run tp @s ~ ~ ~1
execute if block ~-1 ~ ~ minecraft:moving_piston{facing:4,extending:1b,progress:0f} run tp @s ~-1 ~ ~
execute if block ~1 ~ ~ minecraft:moving_piston{facing:5,extending:1b,progress:0f} run tp @s ~1 ~ ~复制代码运行结果是，当自定义方块被活塞直接推动时正常，被活塞拉动时异常；被史莱姆方块与移动方向垂直时推动异常，拉动正常。

实在想不到方法解决了。

replies.author: ⊙u⊙
replies.txt_content: 1）修改原本就是透明的方块。或者使用模型套盔甲架的办法
